title: The Dangers of Driving While Black | Skye Fitzgerald
itunes:title: The Dangers of Driving While Black | Skye Fitzgerald
description:
Good news abounds despite the coronavirus pandemic, Trevor examines the dangers of driving while Black, and director Skye Fitzgerald discusses his documentary short film "Hunger Ward."


To help health care workers in war-torn Yemen fight extreme starvation and malnutrition, please donate at dailyshow.com/HungerWard.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
